title: Djiko FC de Bandjoun
text:
Djiko Football Club de Bandjoun also known as Feutcheu FC is a <a href="Cameroon">Cameroon</a>ian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Bandjoun">Bandjoun</a>. The club competes in the <a href="Cameroon%20Premiere%20Division">Cameroon Premiere Division</a>. The club's colours are red and white.
History.
It was founded in 2011. The club board decided to changed the club name to Feutcheu FC, after the take over of new owner Feutcheu Joseph in 2020.
The club play its home matches at the <a href="Kouekong%20Stadium">Kouekong Stadium</a> in <a href="Bafoussam">Bafoussam</a>.
